emails.Subject: RE: vacation
emails.body: The only thing we need to make sure we are covered on is all the Huber purchases in the Powder River will be starting on Dec 1.  They could be quite involved.  So let's make sure we are ready, especially if you are out.
emails.tokenized_body: The only thing we need to make sure we are covered on is all the Huber purchases in the Powder River will be starting on Dec 1. They could be quite involved . So let 's make sure we are ready , especially if you are out .

emails.Subject: vacation
emails.body:
Mark,
I'd like to request vacation for the following dates:
Tuesday, November 20th
Wednesday, November 21st
Monday, Novmeber 26 the
Tuesday, November 27th.
We got our tickets for San Francisco to go to my parents house for Thanksgiving.
Amy will be here to cover.
Thanks,
Theresa
